_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Bonjour Tremblant!

Winter has been on fire these past few days!
This wonderful Saturday morning brings 10 cm of fresh snow, and conditions on the mountain are simply incredible. Today, the atmosphere is electric with 24H Tremblant in full swing!

Please note that some runs on the South Side are reserved for the 24h event. 

Whether you���re skiing, cheering on participants, or soaking up the festive atmosphere, everything is in place for a memorable day. Have fun and enjoy the full Tremblant experience!

Mountain safety tip of the week: At intersections, give way to those higher up! Give way to those higher up when entering a trail and at intersections. 

Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: An electric atmosphere fills the mountain today with 24h Tremblant in action, along with 10 cm of fresh snow and excellent conditions. Please note that some runs on the South Side are reserved for the event. Variable temperatures and ongoing snowmaking may affect conditions and visibility.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Une ambiance électrisante règne aujourd’hui avec le 24H Tremblant en action, accompagnée de 10 cm de nouvelle neige et d’excellentes conditions sur la montagne. Veuillez noter que certaines pistes du versant Sud sont réservées à l’événement. Les températures variables et la neige de culture peuvent affecter les conditions et la visibilité.
